==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=会|alt=㑹,𠃐}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}

{{Han compound|亼|曾|ls=ic}} – a lid on top of an ancient double boiler.

===Etymology===
All the pronunciations are ultimately cognate, derived from a root meaning "to join, to come together ~ to meet, to gather ~ to match, to fit ~ to understand". Perhaps related to {{och-l|合|to match}} ~ {{och-l|蓋|lid}}.
